import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Detail(){// useParams() returns an object of key/value pairs of URL parameters.
const{id}=useParams();const[isLoading,setLoadingState]=useState(true);const[movie,setMovie]=useState(null);const getMovie=async()=>{const json=await(await fetch("https://yts.mx/api/v2/movie_details.json?movie_id="+id)).json();console.log(json);setMovie(json.data.movie);setLoadingState(false);};useEffect(()=>{getMovie();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:movie.medium_cover_image,alt:movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Published in ",movie.year]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:movie.genres.map(g=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:g},g))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:movie.description_full})]})});}export default Detail;
